caramel.api.audio

Class AudioPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • caramel.api.Component
      • caramel.api.audio.AudioPlayer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Update

    public final class AudioPlayer
extends Component
    This Component is used to play audio files. Only accepts .ogg files.
